page.title: 18RELIGION.
page.content: {ST. Michael's and all Angels Church. Used as College Chapel since they were both built. College Choir attracted many visitors to daily and Sunday Choral Services and thus helped substantially with the upkeep of the buildings and the Warden taking most of the Services.With the closure of the College the future of the Church is in jeopardy as it doubtful if a Parish with under 1500 could maintain it. {Church of England. }Most are of this denomination and worship at Churches at Bockleton, Leysters, Middleton on the Hill, Tenbury Wells and at present St.Michaels. {Catholics and Methodists }worship at Leominster or Tenbury Wells. {Baptists}at Leominster.
